credit_line: Gift of F. Elizabeth De Voy
title: "Armor of 1440; Best Epoch"
medium: Pencil and pen and black ink on stiff cream colored paper
description: A knight in full armor on horseback is seen facing half left, his visor closed, and set against a simulated parchment scroll.  Famous battles listed on ribbons and military trophies form the border.
name: Drawing
